task.prompt: Michelle loves sugar. She bought 14 chocolate bars, each of which had 10 grams of sugar. She also bought a giant lollipop, which had an additional 37 grams of sugar, plus 190 calories. How many grams of sugar were in all of the candy she bought?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Michelle loves sugar. She bought 14 chocolate bars, each of which had 10 grams of sugar. She also bought a giant lollipop, which had an additional 37 grams of sugar, plus 190 calories. How many grams of sugar were in all of the candy she bought?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
